name: AskKC
0:
”Alexa, tell K. C. to Motivate Me”
”Alexa, Open K. C.”
”Alexa, Launch K. C.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. c.
des:
Ask KC is your daily check in and encouragement for the day. 

Simply request "Ask KC to Motivate Me" and Alexa will respond with the message of the day.

Provide feedback to KC on Twitter or Instragram by DMing Ask__KC. Be prepared to have your shareable story inspire a future message!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
